19namespace v8 {
20namespace internal {
21namespace wasm {
22
23WireBytesRef ConstantExpression::wire_bytes_ref() const {
24 DCHECK_EQ(kind(), kWireBytesRef);
25 return WireBytesRef(OffsetField::decode(bit_field_),
26 LengthField::decode(bit_field_));
27}
28
29ValueOrError EvaluateConstantExpression(
30 Zone* zone, ConstantExpression expr, ValueType expected, Isolate* isolate,
31 Handle<WasmTrustedInstanceData> trusted_instance_data,
32 Handle<WasmTrustedInstanceData> shared_trusted_instance_data) {
33 switch (expr.kind()) {
34 case ConstantExpression::kEmpty:
35 UNREACHABLE();
36 case ConstantExpression::kI32Const:
37 return WasmValue(expr.i32_value());
38 case ConstantExpression::kRefNull:
39 return WasmValue(
40 expected == kWasmExternRef || expected == kWasmNullExternRef ||
41 expected == kWasmNullExnRef || expected == kWasmExnRef
42 ? Handle<Object>::cast(isolate->factory()->null_value())
43 : Handle<Object>::cast(isolate->factory()->wasm_null()),
44 ValueType::RefNull(expr.repr()));
45 case ConstantExpression::kRefFunc: {
46 uint32_t index = expr.index();
47 const WasmModule* module = trusted_instance_data->module();
48 bool function_is_shared =
49 module->types[module->functions[index].sig_index].is_shared;
50 Handle<WasmFuncRef> value = WasmTrustedInstanceData::GetOrCreateFuncRef(
51 isolate,
52 function_is_shared ? shared_trusted_instance_data
53 : trusted_instance_data,
54 index);
55 return WasmValue(value, expected);
56 }
57 case ConstantExpression::kWireBytesRef: {
58 WireBytesRef ref = expr.wire_bytes_ref();
59
60 base::Vector<const uint8_t> module_bytes =
61 trusted_instance_data->native_module()->wire_bytes();
62
63 const uint8_t* start = module_bytes.begin() + ref.offset();
64 const uint8_t* end = module_bytes.begin() + ref.end_offset();
65
66 auto sig = FixedSizeSignature<ValueType>::Returns(expected);
67 // We have already validated the expression, so we might as well
68 // revalidate it as non-shared, which is strictly more permissive.
69 // TODO(14616): Rethink this.
70 constexpr bool kIsShared = false;
71 FunctionBody body(&sig, ref.offset(), start, end, kIsShared);
72 WasmFeatures detected;
73 const WasmModule* module = trusted_instance_data->module();
74 ValueOrError result;
75 {
76 // We need a scope for the decoder because its destructor resets some
77 // Zone elements, which has to be done before we reset the Zone
78 // afterwards.
79 // We use FullValidationTag so we do not have to create another template
80 // instance of WasmFullDecoder, which would cost us >50Kb binary code
81 // size.
82 WasmFullDecoder<Decoder::FullValidationTag, ConstantExpressionInterface,
83 kConstantExpression>
84 decoder(zone, module, WasmFeatures::All(), &detected, body, module,
85 isolate, trusted_instance_data,
86 shared_trusted_instance_data);
87
88 decoder.DecodeFunctionBody();
89
90 result = decoder.interface().has_error()
91 ? ValueOrError(decoder.interface().error())
92 : ValueOrError(decoder.interface().computed_value());
93 }
94
95 zone->Reset();
96
97 return result;
98 }
99 }
100}
101
102} // namespace wasm
103} // namespace internal
104} // namespace v8
